mapper.update: UPDATE tb_scheduler_lock SET owner_id = #{ownerId}, lease_until_utc = #{leaseUntilUtc}, fencing_token = fencing_token + 1, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, last_heartbeat_utc = #{updatedAt} WHERE lock_key = #{lockKey} AND (lease_until_utc <= #{nowUtc} OR owner_id = #{ownerId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_scheduler_lock( lock_key, owner_id, lease_until_utc, fencing_token, updated_at, last_heartbeat_utc, recovery_count ) VALUES ( #{lockKey}, #{ownerId}, #{leaseUntilUtc}, 1, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedAt}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_scheduler_lock SET owner_id = #{newOwnerId}, lease_until_utc = #{newLeaseUntilUtc}, fencing_token = fencing_token + 1, updated_at = #{nowUtc}, last_heartbeat_utc = #{nowUtc}, last_recovered_at = #{nowUtc}, recovery_count = recovery_count + 1 WHERE lock_key = #{lockKey} AND lease_until_utc <= #{nowUtc}
mapper.select: SELECT lock_key, owner_id, lease_until_utc, fencing_token, updated_at, last_heartbeat_utc, last_recovered_at, recovery_count FROM tb_scheduler_lock WHERE lease_until_utc <= #{nowUtc} OR (last_heartbeat_utc IS NOT NULL AND last_heartbeat_utc <= #{staleBeforeUtc}) ORDER BY updated_at ASC LIMIT #{limit}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_data_retention_run( id, table_name, started_at, status, trace_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tableName}, #{startedAt}, #{status}, #{traceId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
